*div1 type="summary"* *p*John P. Coles to Austin, August 24, 1832. Settlers on upper Brazos organizing for protection from Indians. Need civil officer, and Coles suggest appointment by Austin*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="08-24-1832">24 August 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*I Recd. Inteligence to day that the party of *person_mentioned*Indians */person_mentioned*that killed *person_mentioned*Reed */person_mentioned*has been defeated there were 8 off them they were *person_mentioned*Wacos */person_mentioned*a *person_mentioned*Hunting party*/person_mentioned* on *location_mentioned*Little River*/location_mentioned* Consisting of 2 *person_mentioned*Mexicans */person_mentioned*2 *person_mentioned*Delewas Indians*/person_mentioned* 2 *person_mentioned*Caddoes */person_mentioned*and 2 *person_mentioned*anadarkas */person_mentioned*were the *person_mentioned*party */person_mentioned*that defeated them Killed 5 Brot in the Scalps of 2 and says the other three were killed in *location_mentioned*Little River*/location_mentioned* and Sunk they Brot in *person_mentioned*Reed*/person_mentioned*s Horse and saddle and deliverd to *person_mentioned*Reeds Farther*/person_mentioned* the people above has appointed*person_mentioned* Company officers*/person_mentioned* the appointment has not been as good as might have been But to place them in a Still Better situation appoint Some *person_mentioned*civil officer*/person_mentioned* among them this is what the thinking Class of men among them think Best, they are willing to be governed by any thing that you say and It is vary Importt to keep them together up there I think that *person_mentioned*Frances Smith*/person_mentioned* wood make the Best *person_mentioned*civil officer */person_mentioned*Because he is more Interested and wood doo more to sustane the place and to keep order a Line from you saying that *person_mentioned*Smith */person_mentioned*shall be the Civill officer among them wood be all Sufficient If you doo not think proper Let the *person_mentioned*Ayuto */person_mentioned*doo it. But an order from you wood be all sufficient and wood be more Respected than anything the *person_mentioned*Auyto */person_mentioned*cood doo*/p*
*p*10 *person_mentioned*men */person_mentioned*starts from here this *date_mentioned n="08-24-1832">evening */date_mentioned*to join the *person_mentioned*people */person_mentioned*up there and to Remain with them untill other arrangements can be made or untill the appearance of Danger subsides It is all Important to sustain them people above for If they Break up the whole *location_mentioned*country above the Yeawa*/location_mentioned*, and perhaps *location_mentioned*above the Navasott*/location_mentioned* wood be abandoned*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J P Coles */person_mentioned*[Rubric]*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Col S F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
